name: Nova Race Puzzle
description:
Nova Race Puzzle is a game for Windows made in less than 72 48 hours for Mini Jam 71 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-71-puzzles) by Chris Antem.

This game is made with GDevelop, please take a look on this game creator software !

In this mix of arcade puzzle and racing game, you need to build the road your ship should take. The faster you go, the higher you score !

This is a prototype, so be gentle with it. And if you liked the game, or if you have suggestions, please leave me a comment !
